description: This file defines an Angular standalone component named PasswordFieldComponent, which provides a password input field with toggle visibility, label, hint, and validation features implemented with Angular forms ControlValueAccessor interface.

classes.name: PasswordFieldComponent
classes.description: An Angular component that encapsulates a password input field with show/hide toggle and validation support.

methods.name: writeValue
methods.description: Sets the current value of the input field, used by Angular forms.

methods.name: registerOnChange
methods.description: Registers a callback function to be called when the input value changes.

methods.name: registerOnTouched
methods.description: Registers a callback function to be called when the input field loses focus.

methods.name: setDisabledState
methods.description: Enables or disables the input field.

methods.name: onInput
methods.description: Handles input event, updates value, and emits valueChange event.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the password between plain text and hidden.
